titles: Summum bonum, or, An explication of the divine goodness in the words of the most renowned Boetius translated by a lover of truth and virtue.
author: Boethius, d. 524.
Elys, Edmund, ca. 1634-ca. 1707.
publisher: Printed by H. Hall, for Ric. Davis,
notes: Running title: The consolation of philosophy. The first-[fourth] booke.
Reproduction of original in Yale University Library.
